# Elite Mobile Bar

* * *

We Bring The Party

Services & Pricing

(937) 423-1037

## Types Of Events

* * *

At Elite Mobile Bar we bring the party to you. We are located in Piqua, OH and
provide mobile bartending service to all of Ohio. Our goal is to make whatever
event you have easier and more fun. We provide mobile bar service for events
such as:

  * Bridal Showers
  * Baby Showers
  * Anniversary Parties
  * Corporate event
  * Wedding   

  * Birthdays

  * Graduations
  * Grand Openings
  * Pool Parties
  * Bachelor/Bachelorette Parties
  * Public Events
  * Or Just Because

## Who We Are

* * *

We are a self-contained mobile bar offering a unique service for any type of
event. Simply choose from one of our pre-populated packages, customize your
own experience, or simply hire us to be your bartender. Either way, we want to
take care of your special day or event and leave you with everlasting
memories.

  * Experience & Professionalism
  * Certified & Insurance
  * Signature cocktails

  * Customizable Menus
  * High-quality bar equipment
  * Excellent communication
  * Unmatched Customer Service

* * *

(937) 423-1037

##### Piqua, OH

Elitemobilebar1@gmail.com

## Mobile Bar Service

* * *

At Elite Mobile Bar we bring the good time to you. We are based out of Piqua,
OH and provide customized mobile bar services throughout Ohio for:

  * Bridal Showers
  * Baby Showers
  * Anniversary Parties
  * Corporate event
  * Wedding   

  * Birthdays ﻿

  * Graduations
  * Grand Openings
  * Pool Parties
  * Bachelor/Bachelorette Parties
  * Public Events
  * Or Just Because

(937) 423-1037

Email Us

## Mobile Bar Base Pricing

* * *

0 - 100 Guests

$1600  

100+ Guests

$2400  

#### Mobile Bar Rental

4 Hour rental based on availability with one certified bartender. Additional
hours & bartenders available.

#### Wine & Beer Service

Draft Beer on tap, canned or bottled beer, red or white wine.

#### Two Custom Cocktails

Our bartenders will mix up two of your favorite cocktails for your guests all
night.

#### Full Service Open Bar

Choose what additional liquors you would like behind the bar. We always supply
your standard mixers, cups, napkins, and garnishes.

Alcohol Ordering: Although alcohol is not included in our pricing, we will
help plan your order, place your order and even have it delivered.  
Figures above are strictly for service, staff and supplies. Addition hours.
bartenders, and add-ons available.  

### Weddings

* * *

Choose from one of our packages or customize your mobile bar experience for
your big day.  

Learn More

### Corporate Events

* * *

From networking to celebrating your employees Elite Mobile Bar can host your
Corporate Event.  

Learn More

### Bridal Showers

* * *

Celebrate the bride to be with friends, family and a customized mobile bar.  

Learn More

### Baby Showers

* * *

Celebrate the soon to be mother with a mobile flower bar.  

Learn More

## Mobile Bar Add - Ons

* * *

### Hydration Cart

* * *

Choose 2 or 3 of our non-alcoholic beverages for your guests to self serve.  

Pick 2: $150

Pick 3: $195  

### Yard Games

* * *

Perfect for any outdoor event! Grab your friends & play any of our outdoor
yard games.  

  * Yardzee
  * Giant Jenga
  * Cornhole
  * Tic-Tac-Toe  

  * Fowling
  * Connect 4
  * Yard pong  

*Don't see a game you would like at your event? Contact us to see if we can add it to our options!  

$150  

### Photo Booth

* * *

Create everlasting memories with our photo booth! ﻿Let your guest take fun
photos together, send them to their phone, and get a copy of all the photos
taken by your guests!  

$450
